title: Task Management
page_description: Manage development tasks in projects, track task progress and status

form.requirementDescPlaceholder: Describe the specific requirements and goals of the task
form.requirementDescHint: This will be recorded as the initial conversation for the task
form.devEnvironmentHint: Optionally select a development environment to execute this task
form.createDescription: Create a new task with requirements and configuration
form.helpDescription: Define your requirements clearly, choose the appropriate development environment, and select the correct branch to begin working efficiently.
form.editHelpDescription: You can update the task title and other basic information. For major changes to requirements, consider creating a new task conversation.
form.createFooterInfo: Make sure to provide clear requirements and select the correct development environment for optimal task execution.
form.editFooterInfo: Changes will be saved immediately. You can view task conversations and execution logs from the task list.
form.executionTimeHint: If no execution time is set, the task will be executed immediately
form.modelHint: Only available for Claude Code environments, choose the model version to use
form.planModeHint: When enabled, Claude will create a plan before executing tasks
form.clickIconsToConfigureHint: Click icons in the text area to configure execution settings
form.attachmentsHint: Upload images or PDF files to provide additional context for your task (max 10MB per file)

push.confirm_description: You are about to push the task branch to the remote repository. Please confirm the following information.
push.warning_description: The push operation will upload your changes to the remote repository, and other team members will be able to see these changes.
push.final_confirm_description: This is your last chance to confirm. Please review carefully.
push.final_warning: Warning: This operation cannot be undone!
push.final_warning_details: You are about to push branch '{{branch}}' to repository '{{repository}}'. This action will upload all your changes to the remote repository and cannot be undone.
push.pushing_description: Pushing your changes to the remote repository...
push.please_wait: Please wait, do not close this window
push.success_message: Branch has been successfully pushed to remote repository
push.success_details: Branch '{{branch}}' has been successfully pushed to repository '{{repository}}'. Your changes are now available to other team members.
push.error_message: An error occurred during the push process
push.force_push_warning_description: Force pushing may overwrite commit history in the remote repository. This is a dangerous operation. Only enable this option if you are certain it is safe to do so.

batch.deleteConfirmDescription: You are about to delete {{count}} tasks. This action cannot be undone, and related conversation records and execution logs will also be deleted.

delete.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone, and all related conversation records and execution logs will also be deleted.

errors.noBranchesFound: No branches found in the repository
